/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is lined with lush green trees, their leaves rustling gently in the breeze, casting dappled shadows on the sidewalk. A blue fence runs parallel to the sidewalk, adding a pop of color to the scene. On the right side of the image, a lamppost stands tall, ready to illuminate the street as dusk falls. The sky above is a clear blue, devoid of any clouds, suggesting a calm and sunny day. The image beautifully encapsulates the tranquility of a typical day in Beijing.
